channel.title: Couple Things I need
channel.description:
Ok here's a couple things Im gonna [b]request[/b] for cause i [b]need[/b] really bad So if anyone could get me these YOU'RE A GOD =/ There's a couple hard to find one and a couple easy that i cant find and i need [b]help[/b].....
[b]BOLD LETTERS ARE A REALLY NEED/REALLY NEED TO KNOW[/b]
1. [b]An Original shop.cfg (I already got autospawn.cfg)[/b]
2. how to add emotes?
3. [b]If you connect you're server to you're hamachi IP and make you're server IP the hamachi IP do people have to connect to you're hamachi? IF SO HOW MANY PEOPLE CAN COME ON IT AT ONCE?[/b]
4. [b]Original Quests? OR SOME QUESTS AND HOW TO ADD[/b]
5. I don't know what else I needed
[b]I will update this if i need more[/b]
TYVM :)

item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

[quote=“Cloud7Strife, post:5, topic:235290”]Lol now you gonna say LOOK is stupid? Look at you’re sig… stop flaming[/quote]I ain’t flaming you, I am trying to help you in some way, the moderators are actually warning/muting people for their actions, all i said was read the rules no stupid titles
and
“[REQUESTS]LOOK![REQUESTS]/HELP”
Is a stupid title, just edit it to something like a few things I need to know. If your going to flame me again please do.

Ok here’s a couple things Im gonna request for cause i need really bad
So if anyone could get me these YOU’RE A GOD =/ There’s a couple hard to find one and a couple easy that i cant find and i need help…
